entities.name: control
entities.description: The person who should have brought something to give to others, but forgot.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person who raises her wand and makes a wreath of Christmas roses blossom.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The person who catches the wreath made by Hermione and lays it on his parents' grave.
